description: Complete IELTS preparation course covering Listening, Reading, Writing, and Speaking with lessons, tips, and practice tests.

lessons.title: Listening Strategies
lessons.content: Learn how to identify keywords, predict answers, and manage time effectively.

questions.question: What is the speaker mainly discussing?

lessons.title: Skimming and Scanning
lessons.content: Practice finding keywords quickly and improving reading speed.

questions.question: What is the main idea of Passage A?

lessons.title: Task 1: Academic Report
lessons.content: Learn how to describe charts, graphs, and data in a structured way.

lessons.title: Task 2: Essay Writing
lessons.content: Understand how to write essays with clear structure, arguments, and examples.

lessons.title: Part 1: Personal Questions
lessons.content: Practice answering simple questions about yourself, hobbies, and daily life.

lessons.title: Part 2: Cue Card Practice
lessons.content: Learn how to organize answers and speak fluently for 2 minutes.

lessons.title: Part 3: Discussion
lessons.content: Practice giving opinions on abstract topics and extending answers.
